title: MonkOfBitcoin
author: MonkOfBitcoin
content: User DigitalMonk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3497607 is false prophet. I AM THE ONLY REAL MONK/PROPHET WHO RECEIVE ENLIGHTENMENT FROM REAL SATOSHI. I hereby ask admin TO BAN this false prophet and ask all TRUE bitcoiner to spread word of truth.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: No - I’m the real Bitcoinmonk and … so is my wife

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Are some of you that bored in real life that what you do to brighten your day is create one troll account after the other, making a complete pussy of yourselves, this is a bitcoin discussion forum, i do not see any reason why someone who has no intention to discuss meaningfully would create an account here, just to troll.I'm sorry you trolls are actually the real losers here, over 50% of the forum member's put most of you on ignore, and you waste valuable time that you should have put into productive things in your life, posting shit that most people do not read .

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: You are just a newbie here and your first post in reputations board obsessing about a troll account that already had some negative reputation. Are you trying to denounce your old account that has zero value here so that it isn't linked back to you in future?Nice try.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on September 23, 2022, 08:50:01 PMYou are just a newbie here and your first post in reputations board obsessing about a troll account that already had some negative reputation. Are you trying to denounce your old account that has zero value here so that it isn't linked back to you in future?Nice try.I think it's just someone who saw DigitalMonks topic and decided to have a little fun. Obviously noone is gonna get banned by their request and noone believes anything that DigitalMonk says except himself. People just get bored here and there and look for cheap entertainment.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: MonkOfBitcoin on September 23, 2022, 09:49:22 AMUser DigitalMonk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3497607 is false prophet. I AM THE ONLY REAL MONK/PROPHET WHO RECEIVE ENLIGHTENMENT FROM REAL SATOSHI. I hereby ask admin TO BAN this false prophet and ask all TRUE bitcoiner to spread word of truth.The two of you are just creating a show that is sounding uninteresting to members of the forum, we don't need you neither him to claim a relationship with Satoshi because thousands of people have done that right before you, why are you both constituting unpleasantries of this kind manners, recently someone also called himself bitcoinmoses making his own display from another dimension to be Satoshi, as for yiur request, that may not be possible except the user do something against the forum's rules and regulations he will then enjoy the benefit of being banned, remember this is bitcointalk and everyone talk whatever he feels like, but we discern the right from the wrongs.
